about_the_game:
Lay down your Defences.
Summon the Militia from the other side to assist you.
Collect scrolls from the enemy and turn the tables with the power within them.
Upgrade your Defences both inside the Labyrinth and out.
Further increase your capabilities of your arsenal with the Masteries.

Labyrinthian Lockdown is a Tower Defence based game that revolves around a Labyrinth that suddenly broke through the surface in a village in the Kingdom of Klondor and now dispenses forces from within in an attempt to claim the land around it's entrance. The Labyrinth will change upon each and every delve, never being the same as previous entries.

Dive into the Labyrinth and protect the Kingdom by defending your Mana Crystal as it is what powers your means of defence that being the power of the elements, one means of defence will be your towers, each one capable of manifesting an elemental projectile allowing you to defeat your foes, another one being the ability to summon units from the Militia from the surface that are mainly used to slow down the enemy while the towers handle the damage, lastly the spell scrolls that have a chance to drop from enemies may be a game changer if applied correctly.

highlighted.name: It's Very Cold... Just Here Though...
Getting Into The Swing of Things
Woah, You Made It This Far!?

name: Labyrinthian Lockdown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Klondor is in grave danger of being overwhelmed, enter the Labyrinth, prepare your defences, defend your Mana Crystal and annihilate the incoming waves of enemy forces that pose a threat to the Kingdom.
